trans-unit.target: Auto-attack<tab>Automatically attack your current target at a set interval determined by your weapon.
Jump<tab>Make a spring from the ground or other base by flexion and sudden muscular extension of the legs.

Limit Break<tab>Spend energy stored in your party's limit gauge to execute a powerful battle technique. The technique executed is determined by the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>role<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of the party member who initiates it. Tank: Increase party defense (area of effect: 50y). Melee: Single-target attack. Ranged: Attack to all targets in a straight line (range: 30y). Caster: Area of effect attack (8y/10y/15y). Healer: HP restoration. Raise at level 3 (area of effect: 50y). ※If target is not weakened at the time of Raise, the target will be restored in a non-weakened state. If target is weakened at the time of Raise, the weakness counter will reset.
Sprint<tab>Increases movement speed. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>10s (20s when not in combat) ※Unavailable in PvP.
Desynthesis<tab>Break down an item into one or more of its original materials.
Repair<tab>Use dark matter to mend damaged equipment.
Teleport<tab>Reduce your body to aether and instantly teleport to any aetheryte to which you have previously attuned. Requires a gil fee paid upon arrival at your destination.
Return<tab>Instantly return to your current home point.
Mount Roulette<tab>Summon a mount at random.
Minion Roulette<tab>Summon a minion at random.
Materia Melding<tab>Affix materia onto weapons and armor.
Advanced Materia Melding<tab>Affix materia onto weapons and armor. Can also affix materia to items with no slots remaining, but success is not guaranteed.
Materia Extraction<tab>Extract the aether from an item with a complete spiritbond, and then recrystallize the resulting residue into a concentrated substance known as “materia.”
Dye<tab>Use dye to color gear.
Target Forward<tab>Toggle forward through nearby enemies.
Target Back<tab>Toggle back through nearby enemies.
Set Down<tab>Put down the object you are carrying.
Decipher<tab>Remove a timeworn map from its glass prison and unlock its mysteries.
Dig<tab>Locate a buried treasure coffer within a 30-yalm radius and extract it from the ground.
Aetherial Reduction<tab>Break down an item to its aetherial components.
Cast Glamour<tab>Use a glamour prism to cast an optical illusion upon a piece of equipment, thus altering its appearance.
Dismount<tab>Dismount your current mount.
Flying Mount Roulette<tab>Summon a random flying mount.
Glamour Plate<tab>Create a set of multiple glamours to apply at once.
Duty Action I<tab>Execute a duty-specific action.
Duty Action II<tab>Execute a duty-specific action.
Put Away<tab>Stow personal effects.
Sort Pet Hotbar<tab>Change the order of hotbar-assigned actions.
Sort Pet Hotbar<tab>Change the order of hotbar-assigned actions.
Attack Target<tab>Selects target marked as target to attack. Cycles through targets numbered from lowest to highest when multiple targets are marked.
Bind Target<tab>Selects target marked as target to bind. Cycles through targets numbered from lowest to highest when multiple targets are marked.
Ignore Target<tab>Selects target marked as target to ignore. Cycles through targets numbered from lowest to highest when multiple targets are marked.
Square Target<tab>Selects target marked with a square.
Circle Target<tab>Selects target marked with a circle.
Plus Target<tab>Selects target marked with a plus.
Triangle Target<tab>Selects target marked with a triangle.
